sentences.en: [as modifier]a door-to-door salesman.
sentences.cn: 一位逐门逐户推销的推销员。

sentences.en: A tap on the door interrupted him and Sally Pierce came in.
sentences.cn: 敲门声打断了他，萨莉·皮尔斯走了进来。

sentences.en: Bob tried the door. To his surprise it opened.
sentences.cn: 鲍勃试着推了推门。令他吃惊的是，门竟然开了。

sentences.en: Could you open the door for me?
sentences.cn: 请你帮我开门好吗？

sentences.en: Don’t forget to lock the garage door.
sentences.cn: 别忘了把车库的门锁上。

sentences.en: food tastes even better out of doors.
sentences.cn: 在户外食物味道更好。

sentences.en: Grace tapped on the bedroom door and went in.
sentences.cn: 格雷丝轻轻敲了敲卧室的门，走了进去。

sentences.en: He activated the door with the miniature sonic transmitter.
sentences.cn: 他用微型声波发射器开启了门。

sentences.en: he went from door to door selling insurance policies.
sentences.cn: 他挨家挨户地推销保单。

sentences.en: her research has opened the door to a deeper understanding of the subject.
sentences.cn: 她的研究为更深入了解这个问题创造了机会。

sentences.en: I let myself out into the street and pulled the door shut.
sentences.cn: 我出门上街并拉上了门。

sentences.en: Let's leave the door open for future stylistic changes.
sentences.cn: 我们得考虑到将来改变风格的可能

sentences.en: Marc appeared through a door at the far end of the room.
sentences.cn: 马克从房间另一端的门口出现。

sentences.en: Outside each door a guard sprang to attention as they approached.
sentences.cn: 当他们走近时，每扇门外都有一名卫兵肃身立正。

sentences.en: Rachel burst out as the door was flung open again.
sentences.cn: 当门被再次猛地推开时，雷切尔冲了出去。

sentences.en: she had closed the door on ever finding out what he was feeling.
sentences.cn: 她不愿了解他的感受。

sentences.en: She went directly to Simon's apartment and knocked on the door.
sentences.cn: 她直奔西蒙的房间，敲了敲门。

sentences.en: The door flew open and Ruth stormed in.
sentences.cn: 门一下子打开了，露丝气冲冲地跑了进来。

sentences.en: the failure is laid at the door of the government.
sentences.cn: 失败归咎于政府。

sentences.en: the family that lives three doors up from us
sentences.cn: 住在与我们相隔三户的那户人家

sentences.en: The front door is locked and all the windows are firmly shut.
sentences.cn: 前门锁上了，所有窗户都关严了。

sentences.en: The kitten wormed its way through the just-open door.
sentences.cn: 小猫缩着身子从刚开了一点儿的门中挤过来。

sentences.en: The queues at the door wound around the building.
sentences.cn: 门口的队伍绕了大楼一圈。

sentences.en: The savoury smell greeted them as they went through the door.
sentences.cn: 他们进门时一阵香味扑鼻而来。

sentences.en: The secretary of state closed the door on future negotiations.
sentences.cn: 国务卿使得即将的谈判无法进行

sentences.en: the trip from door to door could take more than four hours.
sentences.cn: 全部旅程要四个多小时。

sentences.en: the uniformed commissionaires on the door.
sentences.cn: 穿制服的门卫在看门。

sentences.en: There was a heavy thudding noise against the bedroom door.
sentences.cn: 卧室门上发出一声沉重的撞击声。

sentences.en: They had put a padlock on the door of his flat.
sentences.cn: 他们已经在他的公寓门上上了把挂锁。

sentences.en: tickets will be available at the door.
sentences.cn: 到要走时还可以买得到票。

sentences.en: Would they forgive and forget — or show him the door?
sentences.cn: 他们会既往不咎吗——还是会对他下逐客令呢？

phrases.phrase: as one door closes, another opens
phrases.tran_cn: (谚)一扇门关闭的同时，另一扇门又打开了；不应该为失败所挫，因为还会有别的机会出现
职责：在某人的责任范围之内

close the door on 或 shut the door on

phrases.tran_cn: 挨家挨户地；自始至终地
为…打开大门；为…创造机会
